SEARCH
Package com.rikuthin.entities

Class Entity.EntityBuilder<T extends Entity.EntityBuilder<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.rikuthin.entities.Entity.EntityBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The concrete builder class that extends EntityBuilder, used to enable fluent chaining of methods in subclasses.
Direct Known Subclasses:
BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder, MobileEntity.MobileEntityBuilder
Enclosing class:
Entity
public static class Entity.EntityBuilder<T extends Entity.EntityBuilder<T>> extends Object
Abstract builder class for constructing and configuring properties specific to Entity instances.

It uses the **Curiously Recurring Template Pattern (CRTP)** with generic type T to ensure that methods return the concrete builder type for method chaining.

    • self

      protected T self()
      Returns a reference to the current builder instance, cast to the generic type T.

      This method allows subclasses to return their specific type when calling methods defined in the superclass.

      Returns:
      The current builder instance, cast to type T.
